description:
The Copper Spur HV UL4 is a fully featured and crazy-light space for 4 fast-moving travellers. The tent body and fly are made with variable-denier nylon that puts strength where you need it without adding overall weight. There's enough interior space to wait out wet weather and new media pockets for routing cords without causing a tangle.

  • Ultralight nylon and polyester mesh canopy balance weather protection and ventilation
  • Seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (No PVC or VOCs)
  • High peaked vents in the fly
  • Guyline points in the corners
  • High volume pole structure creates near vertical side walls and interior volume
  • Featherlight DAC NFL and NSL poles have pressfit connectors and a high strength-to-weight ratio
  • 8 interior mesh pockets
  • 4 mesh media pockets above the sleeping area with cord loops to route ear buds
  • Double-zippered vestibule door can be rigged up like an awning with your hiking poles
  • Storm flaps on the vestibules keep drips out of the tent
  • Includes 10 superlight aluminum J stakes
  • Optional footprint available for floor protection or an ultralight configuration
name: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV UL 4-Person Tent
